title: Homemade tomato soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter or spread', '1 onion, roughly chopped', 'garlic (optional)', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '600ml (1pt) chicken or vegetable stock', '450g (1lb) tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', 'fresh or dried basil (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
